name: hard_secure
description: You demand employees to renew their passwords very frequently. Whenever someone forgets their password, they request the system to generate a new one for them automatically.
event: The password recovery page becomes the most visited page on your intranet and this has become a well-known fact.
consequences: Attackers can easily get to know that the password recovery page is used so much and start to look for ways to hijack the automated mechanism.
